data.title: Town of East Lyme CT
data.meta_description: Located on Long Island Sound, midway between New York and Boston, East Lyme is a coastal town enhanced by frontage along the Niantic River diversity of population and land uses. Pay taxes online, use GIS maps, find trash collection & meeting schedules. Learn about East Lyme and the villages of Niantic & Flanders.
